personal.name: Alejandro Moral Aranda
personal.about: Versatile finance professional with comprehensive experience across fund accounting, wealth management, and financial analysis. Strong quantitative background with expertise in financial modeling, econometrics, valuation analysis, and risk assessment. Skilled in leveraging technology to solve complex financial problems.
